name: NPR
text:
The tiniest state is moving toward shortening its official name ‚Äî Rhode Island and Providence Plantations ‚Äî due to connotations of slavery.

The latter phrase will be removed from state documents under an executive order by the governor.
https://t.co/SkGraisso7

name: NPR
text:
An FBI investigation has concluded that NASCAR driver Bubba Wallace was not the target of a hate crime. The noose found in Wallace's stall was a garage door pull rope, NASCAR said.
https://t.co/wnAaE1p7WA

name: NPR
text:
In Ohio, a General Motors plant that shuttered last year is being retooled to build electric pickup trucks. The company says it plans to eventually hire thousands of people back to the plant.
https://t.co/Sf2FVRBAAA

name: NPR
text:
Our summer reader poll is back!

This year, with lots of folks staying inside, we want to hear about your favorite books for young kids ‚Äî specifically picture books and very easy chapter books.

Have thoughts? Submit your vote here ‚§µ

name: NPR
text:
Tips to start journaling:
